marklogic.body: 1. Hillary is popular because she's serving as SOS, a position that, by law, forbids her from being involved in politics. That'll change the minute she gets back into politics. 2. Biden is not as high-profile or as well-known as Hillary but that is no independent data that suggests he's unpopular. 3. If Obama drops Biden it would cause a backlash because he would be viewed as (a) disloyal and (b) desperate. 4. It also wouldn't change his vote total. PUMAs have spent 4 years hating Obama. If they didn't forgive him for giving Hillary the top Spot in the administration, they won't vote for him if she's Veep.
